content.text: Mr. Al Brown is a fictional character played by Larry Wilmore in the television series The Office. His name could possibly be Al.

Mr. Brown works as a representative for Diversity Today. He is sent to Dunder Mifflin Scranton to lead a diversity training seminar. It is revealed that the only reason he was sent there was due to Michael performing the comedy of Chris Rock as if he were black himself.
In the episode Gay Witch Hunt, Mr. Brown is seen giving his Diversity Today lecture at the Stamford branch due to events that had taken place at the Scranton branch.
